properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus went to worship
in the synagogue;
with his friends and neighbours
sang his praise to God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We, like Jesus, worship
in the Church today;
still, with friends and neighbours
sing our songs and pray.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When the service ended
Jesus took his praise
into streets and houses
spelling out God's ways.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
People came to Jesus,
frightened, hurt and sad;
helping them to worship,
Jesus made them glad.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit, help us
when this service ends,
still to follow Jesus,
still to be his friends.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
When our neighbours meet us,
may they, with surprise,
catch a glimpse of Jesus
rising in our eyes.
